text: @DrRPNishank @HRDMinistry @narendramodi @AmitShah @cbseindia29 But sir in this pandemic GTU is willing to take exams from 3rd july. What if any student get affected by COVID19. Govt. Of gujarat will take the responsibility??#Save_GTU_Students #Save_Gujarat_Students #Cancel_Exam2020 #PromoteStudentsNotCorona @GTUoffice @ugc_india @CMOGuj
